Text: Your welcome and thanks also to the original ripper/ul....

To split the tracks, you can use the freeware CueTools:
http://sourceforge.net/projects/cuetoolsnet/

PS. The only EAC guide that isn't full of misinformation based on paranoia is at:
http://wiki.hydrogenaudio.org/index.php?title=Exact_Audio_Copy#Exact_Audio_Copy_guides
The Blowfish site is crap. (Yes, I know that is what "elite" torrent sites recommend, but the guide there is still crap.)
